title: Internal Compiler Error when compiling with mongodb as dependency

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Description I've created a new crate and added rocket and mongodb crates as dependencies. Here's what happens when I run `cargo build`. ### How to recreate 1. Run `cargo new somename` 2. Add `mongodb = "2.2.2" crate as a dependency in Cargo.toml 3. Run `cargo build` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.64.0-nightly (c2f428d2f 2022-07-14) binary: rustc commit-hash: c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c commit-date: 2022-07-14 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.64.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling time v0.3.11 Compiling block-buffer v0.9.0 Compiling cookie v0.11.4 Compiling rustc_version_runtime v0.2.1 Compiling ahash v0.7.6 Compiling webpki v0.22.0 Compiling sct v0.7.0 Compiling url v2.2.2 Compiling resolv-conf v0.7.0 Compiling serde_derive v1.0.139 Compiling rand_chacha v0.3.1 Compiling tokio-macros v1.8.0 Compiling digest v0.10.3 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 2', compiler/rustc_builtin_macros/src/format.rs:1001:28 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f4b500a2950 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::heeafe1f1ea6b4c2f at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7f4b500a2950 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hf08684e78cd6c167 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f4b500a2950 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::had9e99c2c8763a1e at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:66:5 3: 0x7f4b500a2950 - ::fmt::h1b4c432d2a1e6303 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:45:22 4: 0x7f4b500fbf2c - core::fmt::write::h87085de871a99231 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:1198:17 5: 0x7f4b50094015 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h7635d2f423aa55dc at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/io/mod.rs:1672:15 6: 0x7f4b500a55e1 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::hc003bc1c22b7967b at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:48:5 7: 0x7f4b500a55e1 - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h1baa1ab7758e52b0 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:35:9 8: 0x7f4b500a55e1 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::he2f5e84c6ab77817 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:295:22 9: 0x7f4b500a52b3 - std::panicking::default_hook::h3f96069db270c68f at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:314:9 10: 0x7f4b50949de4 - std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}::h0fc9e6b3154da131 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:588:13 13: 0x7f4b500a2e34 - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::hb9c2240a67931ff9 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:138:18 14: 0x7f4b500a5932 - rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:584:5 15: 0x7f4b50069c33 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h6bda1b0556b509cd at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/core/src/panicking.rs:142:14 16: 0x7f4b50069b72 - core::panicking::panic_bounds_check::hf8fc252dfbb36006 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/core/src/panicking.rs:84:5 17: 0x7f4b52d84643 - rustc_builtin_macros[6a564b3b10d3c327]::format::expand_preparsed_format_args 18: 0x7f4b52d7ddac - rustc_interface[694c7ab70a1d38bc]::passes::configure_and_expand 23: 0x7f4b52b4d2c1 - ::expansion 24: 0x7f4b52b0bfcc - ::enter::, rustc_errors[3b3e5bcd1e9c2834]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 25: 0x7f4b52b081ff - rustc_span[717885ec7c6cd182]::with_source_map::, rustc_interface[694c7ab70a1d38bc]::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver[1ce26eb46f30f4d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 26: 0x7f4b52b244b0 - rustc_interface[694c7ab70a1d38bc]::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver[1ce26eb46f30f4d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 27: 0x7f4b52b385b2 - >::set::, rustc_driver[1ce26eb46f30f4d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[32c218dbf3427c26]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[3b3e5bcd1e9c2834]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 28: 0x7f4b52b0a78f - std[167b23ae759531ff]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver[1ce26eb46f30f4d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[32c218dbf3427c26]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[3b3e5bcd1e9c2834]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}, core[32c218dbf3427c26]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[3b3e5bcd1e9c2834]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 29: 0x7f4b52b24909 - <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver[1ce26eb46f30f4d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[32c218dbf3427c26]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[3b3e5bcd1e9c2834]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}, core[32c218dbf3427c26]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[3b3e5bcd1e9c2834]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core[32c218dbf3427c26]::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 30: 0x7f4b500af803 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h86b1834fb0da834b at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1934:9 31: 0x7f4b500af803 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h124d05192aaf60e0 at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1934:9 32: 0x7f4b500af803 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::h01e8d05fb6e030ea at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 33: 0x7f4b4fc8c54d - 34: 0x7f4b4fd11874 - clone 35: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.64.0-nightly (c2f428d2f 2022-07-14) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `time` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling idna v0.2.3 Compiling time v0.3.11 Compiling stringprep v0.1.2 Compiling ring v0.16.20 Compiling rustls v0.20.6 Compiling syn v1.0.98 Compiling rand_core v0.6.3 Compiling syn v0.15.44 Compiling block-buffer v0.10.2 Compiling cipher v0.2.5 Compiling crypto-common v0.1.5 Compiling universal-hash v0.4.1 Compiling digest v0.9.0 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 2', compiler/rustc_builtin_macros/src/format.rs:1001:28 stack backtrace: Compiling crypto-mac v0.10.1 Compiling url v1.7.2 Compiling aead v0.3.2 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:584:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/core/src/panicking.rs:142:14 2: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check at /rustc/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c/library/core/src/panicking.rs:84:5 3: rustc_builtin_macros::format::expand_preparsed_format_args 4: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 9: ::expansion 10: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 11: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 12: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 13: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.64.0-nightly (c2f428d2f 2022-07-14) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `time` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
